value.name: None
value.description: No control is used for the handshake.

value.name: XOnXOff
value.description: The XON/XOFF software control protocol is used.

value.name: RequestToSend
value.description: Request-to-Send (RTS) hardware flow control is used.

value.name: RequestToSendXOnXOff
value.description: Both the Request-to-Send (RTS) hardware control and the XON/XOFF software controls are used.

value.name: Finest
value.description: The finest, verbose, debug log level

value.name: Odd
value.description: Sets the parity bit so that the count of bits set is an odd number.

value.name: Even
value.description: Sets the parity bit so that the count of bits set is an even number.

value.name: Mark
value.description: Leaves the parity bit set to 1.

value.name: Space
value.description: Leaves the parity bit set to 0.

enum.name: TrackFlags
enum.description: Indicates which fields holds valid data.

enum.name: TrackFlags3D
enum.description: Indicates which fields holds valid data.

string.name: Name
string.description: A name that uniquely identifies this `AircraftType`

int32.name: Repeat
int32.description: The Repeat Indicator is a directive to an AIS transceiver that this message should be rebroadcast. This was intended as a way of getting AIS messages around hills and other obstructions in coastal waters, but is little used as base station coverage is more effective. It is intended that the bit be incremented on each retransmission, to a maximum of three hops. A value of 3 indicates 'Do not repeat'.

reference.name: Mmsi
reference.description: The MMSI of the original sender.

string.name: Name
string.description: A name that uniquely identifies this `BaseStationType`

double.name: X
double.description: Pan adjustment in meters.

double.name: Y
double.description: Tilt adjustment in meters.

double.name: Z
double.description: Zoom adjustment in meters.

double.name: PanVelocity
double.description: Pan velocity in degrees per second.

double.name: TiltVelocity
double.description: Tilt velocity in degrees per second.

double.name: ZoomVelocity
double.description: Zoom velocity in millimeters per second.

timespan.name: Duration
timespan.description: Duration of the continuous move operation.

double.name: MinTiltAngle
double.description: The minimum tilt angle in degrees. Must be >= -180°

double.name: MaxTiltAngle
double.description: The maximum tilt angle in degrees. Must be <= 180°

double.name: MinTiltScaleAngle
double.description: The minimum angle used to calculate the normalized tilt value.

double.name: MaxTiltScaleAngle
double.description: The maximum angle used to calculate the normalized tilt value.

boolean.name: UseReverseTiltAngle
boolean.description: If set to true, the sign of the tilt value will be reversed.

boolean.name: UseReverseNormalizedTiltAngle
boolean.description: If set to true, the sign of the normalized tilt value will be reversed.

double.name: MinTiltVelocity
double.description: The minimum tilt velocity in degrees per second.

double.name: MaxTiltVelocity
double.description: The maximum tilt velocity in degrees per second.

double.name: MinPanAngle
double.description: The minimum pan angle in degrees. Must be >= -360°

double.name: MaxPanAngle
double.description: The maximum pan angle in degrees. Must be <= 360° and at most 360° greater than MinPanAngle.

double.name: MinPanScaleAngle
double.description: The minimum angle used to calculate the normalized pan value.

double.name: MaxPanScaleAngle
double.description: The maximum angle used to calculate the normalized pan value.

boolean.name: UseReversePanAngle
boolean.description: If set to true, the sign of the pan value will be reversed.

boolean.name: UseReverseNormalizedPanAngle
boolean.description: If set to true, the sign of the normalized pan value will be reversed.

double.name: MinPanVelocity
double.description: The minimum pan velocity in degrees per second.

double.name: MaxPanVelocity
double.description: The maximum pan velocity in degrees per second.

double.name: MinPanSpeed
double.description: The minimum pan speed in degrees per second.

double.name: MaxPanSpeed
double.description: The maximum pan speed in degrees per second.

double.name: MinFocalLength
double.description: The minimum focal length (zoom position) of the camera in millimeters.

double.name: MaxFocalLength
double.description: The maximum focal length (zoom position) of the camera in millimeters.

double.name: MinFocalLengthScale
double.description: The minimum focal length of the camera, in millimeters, used to calculate the normalized focal length.

double.name: MaxFocalLengthScale
double.description: The maximum focal length of the camera, in millimeters, used to calculate the normalized focal length.

double.name: MinZoomVelocity
double.description: The minimum focal length (zoom) velocity in millimeters per second.

double.name: MaxZoomVelocity
double.description: The maximum focal length (zoom) velocity in millimeters per second.

double.name: HomePanAngle
double.description: The home pan angle in degrees.

double.name: HomeTiltAngle
double.description: The home tilt angle in degrees.

double.name: HomeFocalLength
double.description: The home focal length (zoom) position in millimeters.

double.name: PanOffset
double.description: The bearing relative to true north that matches the 0° pan angle.

double.name: TiltOffset
double.description: The offset relative to the horizontal plane that matches the 0° tilt angle.

double.name: AimAltitude
double.description: The altitude that the camera will aim at when targeting a position by latitude and longitude.

double.name: MinimumTargetWidth
double.description: The minimum target width in meters.

timespan.name: TargetLockTimeout
timespan.description: The amount of time that the camera will maintain a fixed lock on a target.

timespan.name: MoveCommandStatusDelay
timespan.description: The amount of time the camera driver will wait after a move command before attempting to retrieve the current status of the camera.

string.name: PtzProfileName
string.description: ONVIF PTZ Profile Name

string.name: PtzConfigurationToken
string.description: ONVIF PTZ Configuration Token Name

string.name: VideoSourceToken
string.description: ONVIF Video Source Token Name

class.name: DeviceHost
class.description: A DeviceHost is specifies the configuration of set of devices that are configured for a specific host computer.

string.name: Name
string.description: The unique name of this `DeviceHost` element. This value must be specified in the <application>.exe.options file for the `HostName` attribute of the `configuration` element before running the server.

string.name: Hostname
string.description: The ip address, or hostname, of the computer running this instance of the Server.

int32.name: Port
int32.description: The port number of this instance of the Server.

string.name: Name
string.description: A name that uniquely identifies this `FacilityType`

class.name: Identity
class.description: Identity base

class.name: Callsign
class.description: Identity base

class.name: InternationalMaritimeOrganizationNumber
class.description: Identity base

class.name: MaritimeMobileServiceIdentity
class.description: Identity base

class.name: Name
class.description: Identity base

string.name: Name
string.description: A name that uniquely identifies this `BaseStation`

string.name: Name
string.description: The unique name of this device.

string.name: Description
string.description: Additional, free form, information about this device.

timeseries.name: EnabledTimeseries
timeseries.description: A `DeviceEnabledTimeseries` that will be used to track the Enabled state of this `Device`.

collection.name: RoutingDestinations
collection.description: Link objects between this Device and `LineInputDevice`s that will route messages to this Device.

class.name: LineInputDevice
class.description: A `LineInputDevice` device is a device that performs line oriented I/O on behalf of the server.

class.name: RadomeDevice
class.description: A Radome device.

string.name: Name
string.description: A name that uniquely identifies this `Facility`

class.name: LineInputDeviceConfiguration
class.description: The configuration for a `LineInputDevice`.

boolean.name: StoreReceivedSentences
boolean.description: If true, the system will store every sentence it receives, even if it was otherwise unable to process them.

boolean.name: StoreSentMessages
boolean.description: If true, the system will store every sentence it sends.

boolean.name: StoreUnsentMessages
boolean.description: If true, the system will store every sentence it was unable to send.

boolean.name: NMEA
boolean.description: If true, the `LineInputDevice` is expected to receive NMEA style sentences.

boolean.name: StrictNMEA
boolean.description: If NMEA is set to true and StrictNMEA is set to true, then sentences must have a valid check-sum.

enum.name: ConnectionType
enum.description: Specifies the connection type for the `LineInputDevice`.

class.name: LogApplication
class.description: Information about an application that emits log entries.

class.name: LogApplicationConfiguration
class.description: Application specific log configuration.

boolean.name: Finest
boolean.description: If `True`, then the finest, most verbose, debug log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Finer
boolean.description: If `True`, then the trace debug log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Fine
boolean.description: If `True`, then the debug log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Info
boolean.description: If `True`, then the information log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Notice
boolean.description: If `True`, then the notice log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Warn
boolean.description: If `True`, then the warning log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Error
boolean.description: If `True`, then the error log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Severe
boolean.description: If `True`, then the severe error log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Critical
boolean.description: If `True`, then the critical error log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Alert
boolean.description: If `True`, then the alert state log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Fatal
boolean.description: If `True`, then the fatal state log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Emergency
boolean.description: If `True`, then the emergency state log level is enabled.

class.name: LogHost
class.description: Information about a computer that hosts applications that emits log entries.

class.name: LogHostConfiguration
class.description: Computer specific log configuration.

boolean.name: Finest
boolean.description: If `True`, then the finest, most verbose, debug log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Finer
boolean.description: If `True`, then the trace debug log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Fine
boolean.description: If `True`, then the debug log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Info
boolean.description: If `True`, then the information log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Notice
boolean.description: If `True`, then the notice log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Warn
boolean.description: If `True`, then the warning log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Error
boolean.description: If `True`, then the error log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Severe
boolean.description: If `True`, then the severe error log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Critical
boolean.description: If `True`, then the critical error log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Alert
boolean.description: If `True`, then the alert state log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Fatal
boolean.description: If `True`, then the fatal state log level is enabled.

boolean.name: Emergency
boolean.description: If `True`, then the emergency state log level is enabled.

class.name: LogLocation
class.description: Position in the source code where the log entry was emitted.

class.name: LogProcess
class.description: Information about a process that emits log entries.

string.name: Path
string.description: The path of the application running in the process.

string.name: Identity
string.description: The user identity that the process runs under.

enum.name: Level
enum.description: The log level of the record.

datetime.name: Timestamp
datetime.description: The timestamp of the log record.

int32.name: Depth
int32.description: The depth of the call stack.

reference.name: Location
reference.description: The source code location of the log record.

string.name: Message
string.description: The log message

string.name: ExceptionString
string.description: If this is a record for an exception, then this is the message extracted from the exception.

class.name: LogThread
class.description: Information about a thread that emits log entries.

reference.name: Process
reference.description: The process that this thread belongs to.

datetime.name: Started
datetime.description: The start time of the thread.

datetime.name: Stopped
datetime.description: The stop time of the thread.

string.name: Name
string.description: The name of the thread.

collection.name: Records
collection.description: The log records generated by the thread.

collection.name: TraceEntries
collection.description: The trace entries generated by the thread.

class.name: LogTraceEntry
class.description: Thread execution trace.

int32.name: Depth
int32.description: The depth of the call stack.

string.name: IpAddress
string.description: The ip address, or hostname, of the computer running the Map Server.

int32.name: Port
int32.description: The port number of the Map Server.

double.name: ImageScaleFactorX
double.description: This value must be set to 1.0.

double.name: ImageOffsetX
double.description: This value must be set to 0.0.

double.name: ImageScaleFactorY
double.description: This value must be set to 1.0.

double.name: ImageOffsetY
double.description: This value must be set to 0.0.

timeseries.name: EnabledTimeseries
timeseries.description: A `MediaProxySessionEnabledTimeseries` used to track the Enabled state of this `MediaProxySession`.

timeseries.name: EnabledTimeseries
timeseries.description: A `MediaServiceEnabledTimeseries` used to track the Enabled state of this `MediaService`.

string.name: RadarIPAddress
string.description: Ip address, or hostname, of the radar

int32.name: RadarPort
int32.description: The TCP port that the radar is listening for new connections on

int32.name: RadarConfigurationPort
int32.description: The port of the radar http server interface.

int32.name: TargetsRefreshRate
int32.description: Radar data refresh interval in seconds

double.name: ImageScaleFactorX
double.description: This value should be set to 1.0

double.name: ImageOffsetX
double.description: This value should be set to 0

double.name: ImageScaleFactorY
double.description: This value should be set to 1.0

double.name: ImageOffsetY
double.description: This value should be set to 0

boolean.name: EnableNmea
boolean.description: Set to true to enable UDP NMEA target reports

string.name: NmeaReceiverIPAddress
string.description: Ip address, or host name, the device that will receive NMEA target reports.

int32.name: NmeaReceiverPort
int32.description: UDP port that NMEA target reports will be sent to.

string.name: NmeaReceiverSourceId
string.description: Talker id for NMEA target reports.

class.name: RadomeConfiguration
class.description: Configuration information for a Radome device.

class.name: SecurityIdentifier
class.description: Base class for SecurityLogin and SecurityRole. Tracks the granted permissions in the system.

string.name: Identity
string.description: Name of user or role

class.name: SecurityLogin
class.description: Base class for SecurityLogin and SecurityRole. Tracks the granted permissions in the system.

class.name: SecurityRole
class.description: Base class for SecurityLogin and SecurityRole. Tracks the granted permissions in the system.

datetime.name: FromTime
datetime.description: The start time of the session.

datetime.name: ThroughTime
datetime.description: The end time of the session.

string.name: Name
string.description: The unique name of this element within the `Catalog`.

timespan.name: MaxRetention
timespan.description: Specifies the minimum amount of time to keep the timeseries values in the database.

class.name: AisAidToNavigationOffPositionTimeseries
class.displayname: AIS Aid To Navigation Off Position

class.name: DeviceEnabledTimeseries
class.description: Tracks the Enabled state of a Device.

class.name: MediaProxySessionEnabledTimeseries
class.description: Tracks the Enabled state of a Media Proxy Session.

class.name: MediaServiceEnabledTimeseries
class.description: Tracks the Enabled state of the Media Service.

class.name: RadomeDewPointTimeseries
class.description: Tracks the Dew Point of a Radome.

class.name: RadomePressureTimeseries
class.description: Tracks the Pressure of a Radome.

class.name: RadomeTemperatureTimeseries
class.description: Tracks the Temperature of a Radome.

class.name: RadomeStatusTimeseries
class.description: Tracks the Status of a Radome.

class.name: TimeseriesCatalog
class.description: A timeseries catalog contains timeseries and sub catalogs. This allows timeseries to be organized in a hierarchical structure.

class.name: TrackerFilterParametersConfiguration
class.description: Configuration information for the Tracker Filter Parameters element.

timespan.name: TimerInterval
timespan.description: The system runs the merge calculations whenever new track information is available; and, in addition, will perform the track calculations at this interval using the latest available track information adjusted for time.

timespan.name: MaxAgeOfCurrentTrackValue
timespan.description: Specifies the time a track can remain inactive, before the system stops considering it for merging and alarms.

double.name: DistanceThreshold
double.description: The, unadjusted maximum distance, in meters, between targets before they are merged.

double.name: DistanceUnmergeThreshold
double.description: The, unadjusted minimum distance, in meters, between targets before they are unmerged.

double.name: MaxCourseDeviation
double.description: The maximum deviation in course or heading, in degrees, between targets that can be merged.

double.name: MaxSpeedDeviation
double.description: The maximum deviation in speed, measured in knots, between targets that can be merged.

double.name: MinimumSpeedThreshold
double.description: The minimum speed, measured in knots, before a target is treated as moving/under way.

string.name: Name
string.description: A name that uniquely identifies this `VehicleType`

string.name: Name
string.description: A name that uniquely identifies this `VesselType`

timespan.name: AlarmTime
timespan.description: For intrusion alarms. Time to zone entry, as calculated from targets course and speed.

timespan.name: RadarTrackMinimumLifetime
timespan.description: The minimum time a radar generated track must exist, before the system will consider it for alarm generation. Used to eliminate noise from spurious short lived radar tracks

double.name: Speed
double.description: For speed alarms. Minimum speed, in knots, that will raise an alarm. Speed alarms are disabled if this value is less than 1.

double.name: Radius
double.description: Alarm zone radius in meters
